div.h4: Public Hearing Morrison Public Schools are currently working on the Title VI Indian Education Formula grant for the 2020-21 school year. If you wish to review or provide input for this project please contact Mr. Haken by email brenthaken@morrisonps.com

span.span: Morrison Public Schools is dedicated to educating our students to become leaders of our communities.
Our teachers and staff are proud to teach students technical and life lessons for students to be successful in any walk of life.

div.class: custom_125909 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.strong: Middle School and High School Information:

span.span:
• Address: P.O. Box 176, 2nd Street & C Ave, Morrison, OK 73061.
• High School phone number: 580-724-3307
• School will begin at 7:40 a.m., and students are tardy if not in class by 7:45 a.m.
• School will end at 3:45 p.m.

• Address: 1225 West Hwy 64, Morrison, OK 73061.
• Elementary School phone numbers: 580-724-3620 or 580-724-3676.
• A call made to the elementary school will no longer be able to be transferred to the administration building (580-724-3341) or the high school building (580-724-3307).

Those phone numbers will have to be dialed directly.
• School will begin at 7:55 a.m., and students are tardy if not in class by 8:00 a.m.
• School will end at 3:35 p.m.
